MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG4 postcode area of Sanquhar. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.33PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2.45AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.40AM on 15th April 2021.
